attributes.action: Stop the broadcast of Freeview Adult Channels
attributes.additional_details:
By default, all Freeview TV Receivers automatically make the 'Adult' channels available. After 11pm, Adult content is shown which encourages the viewer to pay for even more graphic content.

These channels are easily available to children, teenagers and other impressionable people.

I don't think they should be there at all and I would like to see them removed from Freeview completely.
